home.title: 24h of Le Mans, take the start of the biggest car event in France

countdown.title: Countdown to 24 Hours of Le Mans 2025

tondeuse.p1: Welcome to the 24 Hours of Le Mans, the mythical endurance race! Every year since 1923, the best drivers have competed for 24 hours on a unique circuit combining the Bugatti circuit and public roads. Speed, strategy and performance guaranteed!
tondeuse.h2: A unique circuit in the Sarthe
tondeuse.p2: Whether you are passionate or curious, the 24 Hours of Le Mans is one of the three most prestigious races with Monaco and Indianapolis. Experience the passion of the fans, the speed and strategy of the cars in action.

numbers.title: Some figures
numbers.p1: Record attendance for the centenary of the 24 Hours of Le Mans 2023! Join hundreds of thousands of enthusiasts and experience the unique atmosphere of this legendary race. Don't miss the next event and be part of history!

thanks.title: And a big thank you
thanks.p: Thank you to all the enthusiasts who came to celebrate the 24 Hours of Le Mans! Your presence and your enthusiasm make this event an unforgettable experience. We look forward to seeing you again to experience the thrill together at each new edition!

home.services: Discover our ticketing offers, to guarantee your place at this emblematic event. Whether you are passionate about motorsport or simply curious to have a unique experience, our tickets will give you access to the best seats and services to fully enjoy the 24 Hours of Le Mans.

prestataires.name: Service Providers
prestataires.discover: Discover our service providers, who offer a wide range of services to enrich your experience. Each of them is delighted to share their know-how and contribute to making your event an unforgettable moment.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.text: Find all the information about the event thanks to our interactive map. Easily explore the places, services and points of interest for an optimal experience on site.

footer.developpeurs: Cédric COLIN - Marvyn LEVIN - Leslie MERAT - Anna GAIFFE - Sugdenaz EKICI

rules.title: Rules for participating in the draw
rules.one: The participant must be of legal age to participate.
rules.three: The information provided must be accurate and verifiable.
rules.four: Participation in the draw is open until June 25, 2025.
rules.five: The winners will be notified by email on June 26, 2025.

editor.title: Site editor
editor.text: This site is published by a group of students from The University Institute of Technology of North Franche-Comté as part of a university project.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.text1: This entire site is governed by French and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property.
intellectual.text2: The images and videos on this site are the property of their respective authors and are used for strictly informational and non-commercial purposes.
intellectual.text3: The brands mentioned on this site are the property of their respective owners. All reproduction rights are reserved, including downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.
intellectual.text4: The reproduction of all or part of this site on any electronic medium whatsoever is strictly prohibited, unless expressly authorized by the publication manager.
intellectual.contact: Anyone wishing to contest the use of an image or video is asked to contact the publication manager,

hyperlinks.title: Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.text: This site may contain hyperlinks to other websites. We are not responsible for the content of these sites and cannot guarantee their availability.

warning.title: Warning
warning.text1: The information contained on this site is provided for informational purposes only and does not engage the responsibility of the students
warning.text2: We strive to keep this site up to date, but cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the information disseminated on it.

law.title: Applicable law
law.text: This site is subject to French law. In the event of a dispute, only the French courts will be competent.

personal_data.title: Privacy policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: This privacy policy aims to inform you about how we collect, use, store and protect the personal data you provide to us when you use our website.

data_collection.title: 2. Data collection and use
data_collection.collected_data_text: We collect the personal data you voluntarily provide to us when you interact with our site (for example, your name, your email address if you contact us). We may also collect browsing data through the use of cookies and similar technologies.
data_collection.site_functionality_text: Ensure the proper functioning of our website and provide you with the services you request.
data_collection.personalization_text: Improve your user experience by remembering your preferences (language, items in the cart, etc.).

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.text: We use functional cookies to improve your browsing experience. These cookies do not collect any personal data that can identify you. You can choose to disable cookies at any time by changing your browser settings. However, this action may affect certain features of the site.

data_storage.title: 4. Data storage
data_storage.text: The personal data we collect is stored on secure servers located within the European Union. We keep your personal data only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected.

data_sharing.title: 5. Data sharing
data_sharing.text: We do not share, sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

data_security.title: 6. Data security
data_security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against any loss, alteration, destruction or unauthorized access.

your_rights.title: 7. Your rights
your_rights.text: In accordance with the regulations in force, you have the following rights:
your_rights.access_right_text: You can request access to the personal data we hold about you.
your_rights.rectification_right_text: You can request to correct any inaccurate personal data.
your_rights.erasure_right_text: You can request to delete your personal data, under certain conditions.
your_rights.opposition_right_text: You can object to the processing of your personal data for certain purposes.
your_rights.limitation_right_text: You can request to limit the processing of your personal data.
your_rights.portability_right_text: You can request to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format.
your_rights.contact_text: To exercise your rights, please contact us at the following address:

policy_changes.title: 8. Changes to the privacy policy
policy_changes.text: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any modification will be effective upon its publication on our website.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at the following address:
